titleStmt.title: Receipts for Money Taxes (garden-tax, with minor charges); land-tax [geometria])
titleStmt.author: [---]; Syros

msContents.summary: 5 receipts for garden taxes (hekte apomoira, geometria and others) probably all issued to one person, Gaius Iulius Niger; one of them seems to concern the property of a minor

msItemStruct.note: When PMich VI 385 (Inv. 2983 + 2991) and 386 (Inv. 2913) are placed in contact, the horizontal fibersof their rectos coincide for a distance of 4 cm. from the lower edge. It is not now possible to say whether they were accidentally severed or deliberately cut apart.
+ PMich Inv. 2991; cut from the same roll as PMich Inv. 2913 (see note) - archive of Gaius Apolinarius Niger (& family)
